patthana16.50:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.50:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
